speaker: gumball
dialog: I've trapped us inside a video game.

speaker: darwin
dialog: Please tell me what has been going on.

speaker: anais
dialog: A foul curse has been released by Gumball.

speaker: darwin
dialog: You mean the gates of doom were opened by Gumball.

speaker: anais
dialog: The fabric of the universe was ripped apart by Gumball.

speaker: darwin
dialog: Gumball has made quite a mess.

speaker: darwin
dialog: Looks like we will need to beat the game to escape.

speaker: anais
dialog: Sigh, can't be helped. Look at your console and navigate through looking at this hand.

speaker: anais
dialog: To switch between us you must move left <- and right -> when looking at our names with the hand.

speaker: anais
dialog: Try it, look at our names and scroll through with <- and ->.

speaker: anais
dialog: Remember each one of us has different attacks as well.

speaker: anais
dialog: Try scrolling through our attacks using left <- and right ->.

speaker: anais
dialog: To attack go to the bottom of the menu and press SPACE.

speaker: darwin
dialog: By the way you can use the phone to summon friends twice in battle!
